definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
new emperor, new officials (idiom)/a new chief brings in new aides
pinyin: yi1 chao2 tian1 zi3 yi1 chao2 chen2

sentences.english: He and actor people speak just as facing toward an honest courtier and speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他和伶人講話就像對着一個正直的朝臣講話一樣。

sentences.english: He listens to courtier quarrels a voice and argue noisily, like a boiler of gruel of ebullition.
sentences.chinese: 他聽着朝臣爭執聲，吵吵鬧鬧，如一鍋沸騰的粥。

sentences.english: The king disgraced the disloyal courtier.
sentences.chinese: 王國貶黜了那位不忠的朝臣。

sentences.english: The courtiers , having entered, brought furnaces and massy hammers and welded the bolts.
sentences.chinese: 這幫朝臣進得門來，便拿熔爐和巨型鐵錘焊死了門閂。

sentences.english: The courtier obeyed the king's orders in a complaisant manner.
sentences.chinese: 在朝臣服從國王的命令，在殷勤的方式進行。

sentences.english: Every now and them a courtier would stand and listen at the door.
sentences.chinese: 每現在和他們一位朝臣會在門站而且聽。

sentences.english: A courtier then went ahead of the others to report to the king.
sentences.chinese: 事後，一位朝臣先回去向路易十五報告。

sentences.english: The courtiers cringed before the Queen.
sentences.chinese: 朝臣們在女王面前卑躬屈膝。

sentences.english: Courtier salt knows, the Mogan remonstrance.
sentences.chinese: 朝臣都知道這事但是不敢進諫。

sentences.english: The Queen Mother surprised courtiers by suddenly kissing the Duke on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 王太后突然親吻了公爵的臉頰，令朝臣大喫一驚。

sentences.english: King Chulin, the king of the state of Chu, was very found of officials with slender waists.
sentences.chinese: 楚國的國君靈王是非常喜歡腰身纖細苗條的朝臣。

sentences.english: A courtier, Osric, interrupts to invite Hamlet to fence with Laertes.
sentences.chinese: 朝臣奧斯里克計劃邀請哈姆雷特與萊爾提斯決鬥。

sentences.english: Chinese cloisonné was made for the delight of emperors, courtiers and scholars.
sentences.chinese: 中國的景泰藍製品主要爲皇帝，朝臣和學者的玩物。

definition: imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)
imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
